meanings.definition: A functional group consisting of a carbon atom double bonded to an oxygen atom and single bonded to a hydroxyl group.
meanings.sent1: The carboxyl in this compound gives it a sour taste.
meanings.sent2: Organic acids like vinegar contain the carboxyl group.
meanings.sent3: The carboxyl group walked into the molecule party and made everything a bit acidic.
meanings.sent4: Her words were sharp and biting, like the carboxyl group in chemistry.
meanings.sent5: Picture the carboxyl as a tiny acid superhero, ready to react with other molecules!
